section.title: xcmxse.inc
section.programlisting: 00001 * ------------------- Parameters data structure ------------------------ 00002 PARAMETER (MXREAC=76,MXMATE=1000,MAXMFI=2, 00003 + MXSECT=MAXMFI*MXMATE*MXREAC,NADINF=1) 00004 * 00005 * MXREAC maximun number of tables per isotope 00006 * MXMATE maximum number of isotopes allowed 00007 * MXSECT maximum number of reactions 00008 * NADINF words of additional information per reaction 00009 * MXFILE maximum number of data files used 00010 * 00011 *-----------------------------------------------------------------------
